General.Name: Kuaijishan Shaoxing Rice Wine
General.Description: Kuaijishan Shaoxing Rice Wine Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells rice wine in China and internationally. The company offers yellow rice wine products and by-products of glutinous rice under the Kaiji Mountain, Xitang, WuFelt Hat, Tang, and Song Dynasties brands. Kuaijishan Shaoxing Rice Wine Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

3.Name: Ms. Ya Feng Tang
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Deputy Chief Financial Officer
